positions.title: Policy Analyst

positions.companyName: San Francisco and Newark Asylum Offices
positions.description:
-Conduct confidential interviews and adjudicate asylum applications including motions to reopen and/or reconsider the denial of asylum requests. 
- Interpret and apply appropriate policy, regulations, and precedent decisions to make eligibility determinations
- Review information from a range of law enforcement databases and other records to identify possible ineligibility for relief based on national security or public safety concerns.
- Interview refugees overseas to determine their eligibility for resettlement in the United States.
positions.title: Asylum Officer
